2803282938.raceDescription: The Awoken survived the Collapse in deep space. But they were forever changed.

21395672.itemDescription: Forge the fury of undying suns.

44227836.itemDescription: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

158587849.itemDescription: "Wherever you go, your footprints mark the City's outermost walls."

314895450.itemDescription: "I face the challenges to come with dry eyes. There will be a time to mourn, but not until we have our vengeance." —Petra Venj

407626698.itemDescription: Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.

671526060.itemDescription: The Vault whispers of a world beyond.

1170904292.itemDescription: A finely-crafted testament to the many heroes of the Last City

1202967480.itemDescription: Many are brave, but only the strong and the living will ever ride this Sparrow.

1274330687.itemDescription: "If there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?" - Feizel Crux

1352286129.itemDescription: The closer you look, the more chaos you will find.

1665520354.itemDescription: Treat your armor with the same care that the first Titans treated the City walls.

1703777169.itemDescription: You can see everything. You can unsee nothing.

1793886019.itemDescription: The subtle alignments of Light and power converge in your hand.

1835128980.itemDescription: Forged from the remnants of broken Vex.  Some of the component matter is older than the solar system.

2155230383.itemDescription: Accurized long-barrel sniper weapon. Often arrives with unusual onboard systems.

2214944731.itemDescription: Packed to the brim with next-generation explosives, it does not suffer failure.

2300914892.itemDescription: Live and die by the draw of a bow.

2390487995.itemDescription: Serviced by the Tower shipyard, this jumpship is in much better shape than when it arrived.

2502086552.itemDescription: For a Ghost of the Last City.

2502086553.itemDescription: For Ghosts who have braved the elements.

2534352370.itemDescription: A currency used to purchase Legendary gear from vendors in the Tower.
2534352370.displaySource: Obtained from Daily Heroic and Daily Crucible playlists, as well as dismantling Legendary gear.

2561402280.itemDescription: Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.

2672107541.itemDescription: "Come, is there no one who can stand against the Iron Wall?" —Lord Silimar

2675276032.itemDescription: "A subatomic storm is all the more powerful when it is unobserved."

2749350776.itemDescription: Rare coins struck during the height of the Golden Age.
2749350776.displaySource: Silver is available for purchase from Tess Everis at Eververse.

2789471990.itemDescription: The previous owner of these gauntlets left nothing behind but a vague smell of sweat.

2820418554.itemDescription: "Of all the Lights, we burned the brightest." —Unknown Sunbreaker

3159615086.itemDescription: The currency of the City. A programmable matter used as a source of power before the Collapse. Glimmer is shared between all your characters.

3342123014.itemDescription: "When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song

3414643694.itemDescription: "You couldn't get far on one life alone. Not in those days." —Chiyoko Mey

3741354744.itemDescription: Some orders eschew all metaphysics and ontological doctrine in favor of pure combat discipline.

3775512100.itemDescription: You could once hear Mozart from its speakers. Now, quiet as a grave.

3828867689.itemDescription: Those who have stared into the Void are not bound by the laws of space and time.

3833808556.itemDescription: Forged from the ruin of Hezen Vex armor. The sensory interface feels more natural than bare skin.

3871542678.itemDescription: Fast-cycling oxygen filters keep the air crisp and fresh.

3892023023.itemDescription: Delivering the inevitable, one pull at a time.

4143670657.itemDescription: Draw from the Void. Light the way.

434908299.bucketDescription: Remnants of lost histories, imbued with rare power.

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

2689798304.bucketDescription: A currency used to purchase Legendary gear from vendors in the Tower.

2689798308.bucketDescription: The currency of the City. A programmable matter used as a source of power before the Collapse. Glimmer is shared between all your characters.

2689798311.bucketDescription: Rare coins struck during the height of the Golden Age.

2973005342.bucketDescription: Apply new colors and materials to compatible Armor.

4023194814.bucketDescription: Shells used by your assistant and guide, the Ghost.

4274335291.bucketDescription: Emblems to display beside your name in rosters and friend lists.

Decreases the cooldown of your super ability.

Intellect can be increased by your Armor.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

360359141.statDescription: Higher Durability allows your vehicle to take more damage before failing.

1735777505.statDescription:

1943323491.statDescription: Increases the speed at which you regain lost health.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

4244567218.statDescription:
Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

Find and equip armor with Strength to boost this effect.

Burn away your target's defenses. While burning, targets are weakened to both you and your allies.

Ignite the world, creating Sunspots everywhere your Hammer of Sol impacts.

Reduces Sunstrike cooldown. Getting a killing blow with Sunstrike instantly recharges it.
